verses.text: A Song of degrees. I will lift up my eyes to the hills, from whence cometh my help.
My help \add cometh\add* from the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.
Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
The LORD \add is\add* thy keeper: the LORD \add is\add* thy shade upon thy right hand.
The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
The LORD will preserve thee from all evil: he will preserve thy soul.
The LORD will preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for ever.
